page.description: Alpha Anywhere does not really have the concept of a NULL value for a table field value. If you want to test if the field is empty, then you use these expressions:

description.p: The following table details null values for various xbasic data types.

tr.td: You cannot distinguish between records that have no value, and those that have a 0 in them. The .DBF table format, which Alpha Five uses, has no concept of a NULL numeric value. *[xb:= 0]*
You cannot distinguish between records that have no value, and those that have a .f. value. *[xb:= .f.]*
